page.title: 19Teenage Saturday.N.Runcton.
page.content: Extracts from a diary by Lucy Carter aged 14 of North Runcton. "I woke up at 8.00 a.m. and read my magazine for half an hour. ... I dressed in a pair of bleached jeans, a grey shirt, a grey jumper, and a grey necklace.... I put my make up on then made my bed. ... I ate breakfast, rice krispies and orange juice.... then went to get some {pocket money}from my dad. I get eight times my age. .... My mum drove me and my friend, Kerry, to town. We spent the morning in Kings Lynn shopping and walking around and meeting our friends. In the afternoon we went to the{cinema.}When it was finished I phoned my mum so she could come and pick us up. ... When I got home at 6.10 I got myself a drink and a piece of toast and then watched{T.V.}"
